casebody.data:
LAKESHORE GROUP, Charles Zolper, Jane Underwood, Lucie Hoyt, William Reininga, Kenneth Altman, Dawn Schumann, George Schumann, Marjorie Schumann, and Lakeshore Camping, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
STATE of Michigan, Defendant,
and
Department of Environmental Quality, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 159033
COA: 341310 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 8, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the joint motion of the Saugatuck Dunes Coastal Alliance, the Michigan Environmental Council, and the Great Lakes Environmental Law Center to file a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on August 2, 2019, is accepted for filing.
